name: ecmascript-syntax-features-benchmark
description: EcmaScript Syntax Features Benchmark for several browsers and several compile tools

scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run build:execution && npm run build:parsing
scripts.benchmark:execution: npm run build:execution && npm run start:execution && npm run analyze:execution
scripts.benchmark:execution:android: npm run build:execution:mobile && npm run start:execution:android -- -n 10 && npm run analyze:execution
scripts.benchmark:parsing: npm run build:parsing && npm run start:parsing && npm run analyze:parsing
scripts.benchmark: npm run benchmark:execution && npm run benchmark:parsing

author: Yoskutik <yosktuik@gmail.com>
